FuncDef: This command creates summary-addresses for the specified router or VPRN instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies information for the specified IP prefix and mask length.
The subnet mask in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
Specifies IS-IS level area attributes. If no level parameter is specified, the default is level-1/2. Values-level-1, level-2, level-1/2.
Assigns a route tag to the summary address. Values-1 to 4294967295.
